subject: Golf
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The amateur golfer Patrick Cantlay has four top-25s on the PGA Tour this year, but he has resisted millions of endorsement dollars to invest more time in his game and his education.
snippet: The amateur golfer Patrick Cantlay has four top-25s on the PGA Tour this year, but he has resisted millions of endorsement dollars to invest more time in his game and his education.
